name: Tennis Open 2020
description:
This gameplay feels almost real! In Tennis Open 2020 your real knowledge of tennis will come in handy, since proficiency levels, game styles and moves of particular players have been sculpted to perfection with amazing attention to detail.

GAME MODES
Career – get onto the court, play tennis world tournaments and become the master.
Quick play – no pressure, no standards, just pure happiness from tennis.
Training – work on your form (precision, power, strength endurance...) to get ready for a clash with the best tennis players in the world.

Get full control over every move on the court. It is possible only in Tennis Open 2020!

Natural moves of the player and precise hits (drop shots, lobs, slices, slams) give you that real tennis feeling!

Tennis tournaments from all over the world: France, Australia, Great Britain, even the US.

CONTAINS
- Over 25 career tennis players from all over the world.
- 16 tournaments, 4 sets each and grand prizes (France, USA, Australia, Great Britain).
- Quick play with a rival, the ability to choose the surface, match time and difficulty level.
- Full configuration of the player character and their equipment, thanks to unique Grand Slam sets.
- Special training mode lets you work on your condition and abilities.
- The wheel of fortune helps you get into an everyday routine.
